subject: order #SSN1571 , Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motors are not working
description_text:
Hi,

I ordered for my simsonn pro x pedals the VAM pro liner motors (two of them)

I connected them to the external box of the pedals and also connected the
power supply (I didn't get any power cable in this shipment).

Your software shows status of connected but when I am testing it I don't
get any response from the motors. only silence!!!

Where is my problem??

Thanks in advanced,

Eitan lael

conversations.body_text: Hi EITAN LAEL,  Yes, we also hope everything will come to an end soon so that everyone can return to normal life. We will closely monitor the latest developments to ensure your order is handled promptly and keep you updated at all times.

That's great, thank you very much.

On Sun, Jun 22, 2025 at 4:52 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi simpsonn,

Now after the war is ended can you try to send my order #SSN1571

Thanks,
Eitan

On Sun, Jun 22, 2025 at 4:52 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi EITAN LAEL,    We are contacting more logistics providers for viable shipping options. One is currently available to ship, but the price is unacceptable to us and we will wait for an update from him.

Hi EITAN LAEL,     Please make sure your SIMSONN Manager is updated to version 2.1.0. Then follow the steps below:    Open the software and go to Settings → Update, then click Check for Updates.    Check if the ProX firmware can be updated to version 2.0.3.    If no automatic update is available, please use Manual Update: Path: Settings → Update → Manual Update Firmware → pedals → firmware → pedals-prox.sfu.    After the update, please test again.    If the issue persists, try reconnecting the USB and power cable, then test again.    If it still doesn’t work, please send me a screenshot of the software interface so I can check further for you.

HI,

When I am trying to run step 3 I have only these files in the location as
he appears in this screen shot:
[image: image.png]

I don't have a file by the name of "*pedals-prox.sfu"*

*My pedals firmware version is: *
[image: image.png]

so step 3 can't be done....

also when I am checking for updated the software writs
"already latest version"

Eitan

On Sat, Aug 30, 2025 at 6:34 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi EITAN LAEL,     Please select the prox.sfu file to perform the upgrade. After the upgrade is complete, reconnect the USB cable first, and then plug in the motor power supply. Finally, please confirm that the version numbers are displayed as: CPU1: 2.0.3, CPU2: 2.0.2.

Hi,

I done all the steps above but the version still *CPU1: 2.0.2, CPU2: 2.0.0*

*The FFB for VAM is not working*

*what should I do?*

*Thanks,*
*Eitan*

On Mon, Sep 1, 2025 at 4:00 AM service@simsonn.com

Do you have any solution?

please response

Eitan

Hi EITAN LAEL,  Could you please install the Todesk tool now? I happen to be available and can remotely check and update your device for you. Todesk does not require registration — if you see a registration prompt, simply click the “X” in the top-right corner to close it. Once installed, please provide me with the ID and temporary code, and I will be able to assist you remotely.      https://dl.todesk.com/windows/ToDesk_Setup.exe

I will contact you at next day at morning (local time), now I am at work
and not in front of my computer

Eitan

On Wed, Sep 3, 2025 at 7:40 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi EITAN LAEL,  Please let us know your time zone or city, and the time that works best for you locally, so that I can schedule an appropriate time to address your issue.

city: Tel aviv, israel gmt+2

local time 07:00 am

On Wed, Sep 3, 2025 at 10:04 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi EITAN LAEL,  Okay, let's set it for 12:00 PM (China Time) on September 4th. I will be online on time.

Hi,

Device id: 993 335 301
temp pass: w4pgm65d

eitan

On Wed, Sep 3, 2025 at 12:54 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Service,

No, we have a new problems with the VAM Pro:

1. The Simpsson Manager does not open, there is an error popup in chinese
[image: image.png]

2. The VAM engine does not stop working. They are working when the computer
is on and working when he is off. all the time. they will not
work only when I am disconnecting the power supply.

Thanks,
Eitan


On Thu, Sep 4, 2025 at 7:25 AM service@simsonn.com

also now it returns to previous version. no exe file for the new

Eitan

Hi,

 After checking and replacing the right shortcut to the manager,  The
software and the hardware are running fine!!

Please ignore the last mail that I sent to you and close the ticket

Thanks,
Eitan
ID 为 607 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单607  
      主题: Re: Simsonn Order Shipment Confirmation  
      描述:  Thanks for your response.   
 I hope also this war will be ending in the near future 
   
 Eitan 
 
  
 בתאריך יום ה׳, 19 ביוני 2025, 13:53, מאת SIMSONN ‏<service@simsonn.com>:
